attributes.action: Allow golf courses to open as a daily form of exercise during covid 19 lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: Allow the reopening of golf courses during Covid-19 lockdown as a form of daily exercise.
attributes.background: Allow golf courses to open during coronavirus lockdown as a daily form of exercise. This would be on the premise that social distancing measures, and limitations on the number of players were adhered too.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that golf courses in England can re-open. 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
